milestones.title: Successfully completed the MLDL program offered by Ineuron.ai.
milestones.description: I have had the opportunity to expand my knowledge by learning a multitude of topics, including Machine Learning Algorithms, Python, API using Flask, Model Deployment in Heroku, databases such as MySQL and MongoDB Atlas, various statistical modules, and more. Additionally, I have applied my learning by creating a few end-to-end projects.

milestones.title: Turning the Tassel: Celebrating the Achievements of Post Graduation
milestones.description: Successfully completed the program requirements and was awarded a Master of Science degree in Data Analytics.

milestones.title: Participated in Google Cloud Community Days India, 2021
milestones.description: At Google Cloud Community Days India 2021, I had the valuable opportunity to gain knowledge on Cloud Technology and Google Cloud Certifications from esteemed industry professionals.

milestones.title: Participated in Codathon 2021 organised by NIT-Bhopal
milestones.description: I had the privilege of participating in a hackathon for the first time, where I had the opportunity to interact with some of the brightest minds from NIT-Bhopal.
